News

all news
Geek Fest(23.11.2023)

Geek Fest - immersion in the world of 8-bit wonders! Open the door to time and go back to an era when games were simple but addictive. At this event you will find countless retro games, tournaments, 8-bit cosplay and fun competitions. Feel the nostalgia and meet like-minded people to celebrate the golden era of video games!

Detail
LEGO Art Festival(02.12.2023)

LEGO Art Festival - the magic of bricks! Immerse yourself in a wonderful world of creativity where LEGO becomes art. At this festival you will find magnificent structures, see works of art created from thousands of bricks, and even take part in workshops on building your own masterpieces. For lovers of all ages, this is an event that will awaken your imagination and inspire you to create your own creations!

Detail
Arcade Game Competition(24.01.2024)

Get ready for battle in the world of arcade games! Our upcoming tournament promises a lot of fun and competition. Compete in classic and modern arcade games, prove your skills and earn glory. Competitions for all levels of players - from beginners to veterans. Are you ready to become a champion?

Detail
